DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to demonstrate non-inferiority of Jext compared with EpiPen for the proportion of subjects with a successful self-injection. And to evaluate and compare the handling characteristics of two auto-injectors (Jext and EpiPen).
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Evaluation of Handling Characteristics of Two Adrenaline Autoinjectors,EpiPen in Comparison With Jext
